courses.title: Fashion Design Basics
courses.summary: Learn the fundamentals of fashion design, from sketching to creating your first collection.

courses.title: Advanced Modeling Techniques
courses.summary: Master the art of runway walking, posing, and professional modeling techniques.

courses.title: Fashion Photography Masterclass
courses.summary: Professional techniques for capturing stunning fashion photography in any setting.

courses.title: Textile Design Workshop
courses.summary: Explore the world of textile design from traditional techniques to digital printing.

courses.title: Sustainable Fashion Practices
courses.summary: Learn how to incorporate sustainable practices into your fashion design process.

courses.title: Digital Fashion Marketing
courses.summary: Master the art of marketing fashion products and brands in the digital age.

courses.title: Portfolio Building for Models
courses.summary: Create a professional modeling portfolio that showcases your versatility and skills.

courses.title: Editorial Styling Workshop
courses.summary: Learn the art of styling for editorial photoshoots and campaigns.

courses.title: Fashion Illustration Techniques
courses.summary: Master traditional and digital fashion illustration techniques for your design portfolio.

courses.title: Runway Modeling Walkthrough
courses.summary: A comprehensive guide to perfecting your runway walk for fashion shows.

courses.title: Fashion Business Fundamentals
courses.summary: Learn the business side of fashion, from startup to scaling a successful brand.

courses.title: Fashion Show Production
courses.summary: A comprehensive guide to producing professional fashion shows from concept to execution.

categories.name: Beginner
categories.description: Courses for those just starting their fashion journey

categories.name: Intermediate
categories.description: For those with some experience in the fashion industry

content.title: Week 1: Introduction to Textile Design
content.content: This week covers the fundamentals of textile design and the different approaches used in the industry.

content.title: Week 2: Traditional Techniques
content.content: Learn about traditional textile design techniques from around the world.

content.title: Week 3: Digital Printing Methods
content.content: Explore modern digital printing methods and how they're transforming the textile industry.

content.title: Week 1: Fashion Show Concepts
content.content: Learn how to develop compelling concepts for fashion shows that tell a story.

content.title: Week 2: Venue Selection and Layout
content.content: Understand the factors involved in selecting and designing the perfect venue for your fashion show.

content.title: Week 3: Model Casting and Coordination
content.content: Master the process of casting the right models and coordinating the runway presentation.
